title: WTB T206 Cobb Red Portrait with the following backs

posts.post_title: WTB T206 Cobb Red Portrait with the following backs
posts.post_content:
Hi Everyone,

I am looking for a T206 Cobb Red Portrait with the following backs:
  * EPDG
  * Sov 460
  * Pied 460 Fact 42
  * T213 Coupon Type 3


Please email me at [url]blunder19@aol.com[/url] if you have one that you would be interested in selling or trading. The cards I have for trade would be T206 rare backs or T206 errors.

Jamie
Bump.. still trying to find the EPDG, SOV 460, PIED 460 Fact 42, and T213 Type 3

Bump... still looking for these 4 red cobbs..Trying to get closer to completing the cobb back run..
